mapper.sql: rNO, photo, rname, Former_name, idcard, sex, age, birthday, position, Marital_status, Native_place, household_registration, address, eid, pid, pcid, rid, tpid, Active_area, eflag, flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from rectification
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into rectification (rNO, photo, rname, Former_name, idcard, sex, age, birthday, position, Marital_status, Native_place, household_registration, address, eid, pid, pcid, rid, tpid, Active_area, eflag, flag) values (#{rno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{householdRegistration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Former_name = #{formerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where rNO = #{rno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rectification set photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Former_name = #{formerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Marital_status = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, household_registration = #{householdRegistration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pcid = #{pcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tpid = #{tpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Active_area = #{activeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eflag = #{eflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rNO = #{rno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select r.rno,r.phone,r.photo,r.rname,r.Former_name,r.idcard,r.sex,r.age,r.birthday,r.position, r.Marital_status,r.Native_place,r.household_registration,r.address , r.Active_area,e.name ename,p.name pname,pc.name pcname,rg.name rgname,tp.name tpname,cd.context, rn.family,rn.address paddress,rn.phone pphone,j.jNo,j.courtName,j.judgmentDate,j.originalDate,j.Supplementary_punishments, j.charges,j.Verdict_penalty,j.executionDate,j.endDate,j.inAffair,j.affairDate,rf.fname from Rectification r join education e on r.eid=e.id join politics p on r.pid=p.id join perform_category pc on pc.id=r.pcid join regulatory rg on rg.id=r.rid join tp_mz tp on tp.id=r.tpid join corpus_delicti cd on r.rNO=cd.rNO join relation rn on r.rNo=rn.rNO join judgment j on j.jNo=r.jNO join RectFlag rf on rf.id=r.flag
